title: Announcement
medium: Offset lithograph and letterpress on coated white paper board; mounted to grey-blue album sheet to show verso.
description: Verso: blue, red, white plaid pattern (arranged on the diagonal).

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement.
Offset lithograph and letterpress on coated white paper board; mounted to grey-blue album sheet to show verso.. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-212.
